meanings: go to Mt. Geumgang by land

meanings.meaning: go by rail[ship, air, land, sea]

examples.korean: It takes about five hours by road. 발음듣기 (그곳은) 육로로[차로] 약 5시간 걸린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It takes about five hours by road. 발음

examples.korean: We made the journey by land, though flying would have been cheaper. 발음듣기 비행기로 가는 것이 비용이 덜 들었겠지만 우리는 육로로 여행을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We made the journey by land, though flying would have been cheaper. 발음

examples.korean: to travel by air/land/sea 발음듣기 항공편/육로/해로로 이동하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
go by train [ship, rail, air, land, sea] 발음듣기 기차[배, 철도편, 항공편, 육로, 해로]로 가다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: go by train [ship, rail, air, land, sea] 발음

examples.korean: We plan to make an overland jaunt across China. 발음듣기 우리는 육로로 중국 횡단 여행을 할 계획이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We plan to make an overland jaunt across China. 발음
